DOC.brief_summary: GlaxoSmithKline Philippines submit registration file Purified Meningococcal Polysaccharide Serogroup ACWY Vaccine ( Mencevax ACWY ) . This study conduct collect clinical data local target population order assess occurrence rare adverse event vaccination per requirement Philippines Bureau Food Drugs Directive .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Purified Meningococcal Vaccine With Serogroups ACWY , 3,000 Filipino Subjects Aged > 2 Years
DOC.detailed_description: All subject receive single dose GSK Biologicals ' Mencevax ACWY vaccine accord prescribe information . Subjects stratify follow age group : 2 5 year 6 17 year > 18 year The Protocol Posting update order comply FDA Amendment Act , September 2007 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects investigator believe and/or parent/guardian comply requirement protocol . A Filipino male female > 2 year age time first vaccination . Free obvious health problem establish medical history clinical examination enter study . Written inform consent obtain subject and/or parent/ guardian subject . Exclusion criterion : Subjects suffer acute severe febrile illness . History allergic disease reaction likely exacerbate component vaccine . Major congenital defect serious chronic illness . History neurologic disorder seizure . Pregnant lactate female . Female plan become pregnant . History chronic alcohol consumption and/or intravenous drug abuse . Any contraindication state Prescribing Information .
DOC.keyword: Meningitidis serogroups A , C , W & Y disease
